title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: 3 Pack Women's Mock Turtleneck Knit Sweaters, Crew Neck Long Sleeve Tops Lightweight Thermal Pullover Basic Shirts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bethpage
items.body: these are very nice sweaters I have them in all colos True to size, I went up a size only because I like loose clothing . very nice with working attire. or everday use. I washed in cold delicate and its fine a little iron is needed Read more
items.author: Iris Noya

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and comfortable.
items.body: This is a set of three mock turtleneck sweaters in classic colors. Versatile! I have worn them with jeans and skirts. Because of the way they are constructed, I am glad I got a size up. If I had gotten the size I normally wear the sleeves would have been binding in the shoulder/armpit area. I do not like regular turtlenecks because they are too high and tight around the throat. These sweaters give the feel of a turtleneck without being uncomfortable. They are not bulking and still feel warm. Very comfortable. I have washed them a couple of times and have seen no shrinking, stretching or fading of color. Excellent value for the price. Read more
items.author: William Clyde Timbs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value 3 Pack
items.body: I ordered this 3 pack of mock turtlenecks as an under layered garment. For reference I’m 5’2” and 155# and I ordered the M. These tops are perfect for my needs as they are a nice weight, being very light and comfortable. They are also attractive: I chose the cream,brown and black. I like the ‘mock neck’ as it provides warmth without that constricting feeling that turtlenecks give me. These tops are fairly snug fitting, which is what I wanted so no complaints; however if you want a looser fit sweater I suggest sizing one or even two sizes up. These are a nice quality sweater and good value for money. Planning to purchase other colors. Read more
items.author: Ladywiggler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this brand
items.body: Oakgarden once more? As I've mentioned, I am quite fond of their products. This particular combination offers three packs of long-sleeve basic shirts in a variety of colors. The fabric is both lightweight and warm, ensuring your comfort and freedom of movement throughout the autumn and winter seasons, without any sensation of bulkiness or heaviness. The composition of the material is 49% Viscose, 23% Nylon, and 28% Polyester. I must admit, I was genuinely surprised by the quality, as I even found myself wondering if it might be cashmere due to its delightful feel. The mock turtleneck tops are both fashionable and comfortable, and the half-neck design elegantly highlights your shoulders and neck without appearing voluminous. The design is straightforward, providing a comfortable wearing experience that is neither constricting nor overly formal, simply offering a relaxed ambiance. These shirts are ideally suited for a wide range of indoor and outdoor activities, including professional settings, business engagements, daily wear, social gatherings, or romantic outings. Read more
items.author: Lovelybsexy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Soft, and Perfect for Everyday Wear!
items.body: This 3-pack of women’s mock turtleneck knit sweaters is a great addition to any fall or winter wardrobe. Made from a soft and stretchy blend of viscose, nylon, and polyester, the fabric is lightweight yet warm—keeping you cozy without the bulk. Each top features a half-neck, crew-style design that gently shows off the neckline and shoulders while staying casual and comfy. The fit is relaxed, not too tight, and gives off an effortlessly stylish, laid-back vibe. These tops are easy to mix and match with jeans, leggings, sweatpants, or layered under jackets and cardigans. They work for everything from the office to a coffee date or even light workouts. The simple design also makes them great for accessorizing with necklaces or scarves. Read more
items.author: Michael Vargas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too small and doesn't wash well
items.body: I'm not real happy with these. For size they were a little tight and I should have ordered one size up. The material wasn't as soft as I expected. The colors are very bright just as they are shown in the picture. However they did not wash well. The body of the sweater once hung up looked great. However the collar and the bottom of the sweater had a wavy crinkled look. Not natural at all and made it very uncomfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Wendy D

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay Mock Turtlenecks - Neck Ruffles Upon Washing
items.body: These are decent mock turtlenecks for the price. They are comfortable with a the sleeve having a slight fullness heading into the cuff. I washed these on delicate, cold water and hung to dry. I noticed the mock turtlenecks have a slight 'ruffle' to them after washing and drying. They do lay fairly flat when wearing. These are okay sweaters, I will probably wear them under a vest as by themselves they are just kind of plain. They will be good for online meeting though! Read more
items.author: SmokeyKoi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Trio of Soft, Versatile Sweaters
items.body: This is such a lovely set of sweaters — three classic colors, each one soft, well-made, and incredibly versatile. They’re warm and comfortable without being bulky, and they work with just about anything in your closet. I’ve worn them with jeans, skirts, and slacks, and they look equally nice for casual outings or for a professional setting. As a teacher, I really appreciate clothing that mixes and matches easily with patterned skirts or dress pants, and these sweaters make getting ready in the morning so simple. The fabric is thick enough to feel warm and substantial, but thin enough that it isn’t sheer and doesn’t cling or reveal lumps or bumps. They fit true to size and feel good on the skin. Because this is a three-pack, it’s also a great value — truly a bargain for the quality. These would make excellent gifts, too. I’m already planning to pick up a second set for my sister-in-law because I know she’ll love them as much as I do. Recommend: 5/5. Read more
items.author: Heather H.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Khaki, Dark Green, Black, Charcoal Gray, Burgundy, Khaki, Cream, Brown, Black, Pink, Navy Blue, Black, Wine Red, Prussian Blue, Black, Apricot, Prussian Blue, Black, Gray, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
